title: High-Logic FontCreator 5.5 Released
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808061550/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 30.May.2006 9.17am 

High-Logic FontCreator 5.5 Released

In this newsletter:

\* FontCreator version 5.5 released  
\* Special offer: get FontCreator Professional Edition for $99 only  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

We are pleased to announce the release of FontCreator 5.5 for Windows.

HIGHLIGHTS:  
FontCreator Version 5.5 contains many improvements and features. The new  
drawing tools greatly simplify and speed up the design process. Other new  
features include Align and Distribute operations, to ensure precise  
positioning. The improvements to Panose Classification and the enhanced  
Validation features enable you to improve the quality of your fonts. The  
extended Complete Composites feature quickly adds diacritical marks to  
incomplete glyphs. This powerful feature can complete over a thousand  
characters within a few seconds.

If you have not downloaded FontCreator 5.5 yet, get it from:  
 [http://www.high-logic.com/download.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808061550/http:/www.high-logic.com/download.html "http://www.high-logic.com/download.html")

SPECIAL OFFER:  
FontCreator version 5.5 is available in two editions. For a limited time the  
Home Edition costs $65.00 and the Professional Edition costs $99.00, while  
an upgrade from version 4 to the Professional Edition costs $59.00. People  
who received a free registration code (back in January 2005) for version 5.0  
can no longer use that, and have to upgrade from version 4 as well.

For more detailed information about pricing, please visit:  
 [http://www.high-logic.com/register.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808061550/http:/www.high-logic.com/register.html "http://www.high-logic.com/register.html")

Best regards,

Erwin Denissen
